study_type.description: Classification of the type of study conducted. Where applicable, one of the following five study types should be selected: <'Experiment', 'Historical Event', 'Analytical Study', 'Lit Review', 'Other'>

comp_type.description: Type of component(s) invenstigated in study.

doi.description: Digital Object identifier. Empty if the paper does not have a DOI.

citation.description: Full reference for publication, including authors, year, title, and publisher. Only required if no DOI is available.

publication_type.description: Classification of the type of publication. Where applicable, one of the following six study types should be selected: <'Journal Article', 'Conference Paper', 'Technical Report', 'Master's Thesis', 'Dissertation', 'Other'>

pdf_saved.description: TRUE if pdf is saved in the archive repository.
